subEntries.title: MatroxIntellicam
subEntries.text: Matrox Imaging Library (MIL) 10 Update 20 Release Notes (Matrox Intellicam) April 2017 ?(c) Copyright Matrox Electronic Systems Ltd., 1992-2016.   This document outlines what is new with Matrox Intellicam and explains the current limitations and particularities. Contents 1.???????? Matrox Intellicam 1.1??? Summary of bug fixes   1.   Matrox Intellicam 1.1      Summary of bug fixes ?  Having insufficient non-paged memory did not always get reported properly and led to incorrect video acquisition (typically black video or a frame rate of 0 fps). Matrox Intellicam now reports an appropriate error message telling users to increase non-paged memory using Matrox MilConfig utility. ?  Fixed inconsistencies in the menus associated with Matrox GigE Vision, Matrox USB3 Vision, or Matrox Clarity UHD systems.
